Good game and you don't need a good pc to run it

Very addicting and fun to play with your friends. Its easily the most balanced fps game due to few rng. It still takes time to learn the mechanics (movement, spray pattern, callouts, positions). MM can be toxic though.
I would recommend if you like games that are very hard and require absolute perfect over days and hours. This game is most fun when played with friends.

This is a very bad game. The racial diversity is a large problem in an official matchmaking situation which substantially affects your experience in a negative way. The Filipinos and Chinese people are some of the most toxic,annoying and idiotic people in the game. My experience playing this game has been ruined by those who do not seek to improve or those who genuinely just have absolutely no skill in the game. "The phrase it's just a game is such a weak mindset." -Ninjuh
